results.description: A group for people who enjoy dressing up on a Saturday afternoon having brunch. Enjoy cultured discussion. Group meet once a month, every time, there will be a suggested fashion style and a discussion topic. What's more, there will also be fun interactive games at the table. Let's dress up nicely and have a little brunch! :)
results.name: Dress up nicely for a brunch

results.description: Hi ladies! I created this group in the hopes of bringing together young (20s & 30s) women who are looking to make some new friends and have some fun in the process. Although the word "professional" is in the title, this isn't met to be a networking group! I've just found that the longer I'm in the professional world, the harder it is to expand my social circle and meet other like-minded women. The idea of this group is to form genuine relationships through happy hour events, dinners and brunches, fitness classes, museum visits, sporting events, and other events/activities around the city. Looking forward to meeting everyone!
results.name: Professional Ladies of New York City

results.description:
If you are intrigued, and interested in Helicopters or aviation in general, then this is your group. 

we are about bringing Helicopter lovers together.

We offer tours to the NYC skyline, and other wonders in the Tri-State area.
Come join us for exceptionally  joyful rides, and fun outings.
results.name: New York City Helicopter lovers Meetup

results.description:
Many of us spend a lot of time in gyms and fitness groups that make us uncomfortable. Lots of men around, lots of equipment we're not sure how to use, and results that we just aren't seeing.

This group is tailor made for women. Women who want to burn fat, tighten up, and feel good about themselves while meeting some new people in the process. There will be a lot of conditioning, kettle bells, slam balls, rowing, resistance biking, sprinting, slam balls, sled pushes, prowler sprints, squats, wall balls... you name it. This group is for any level, any woman, any age. Injuries, no past fitness experience, not really sure what you're doing, thats okay. We will figure it out.

Stop feeling judged. Stop feeling insecure. Stop trying to figure out what to do and how to do it.

Join us. No cost. No worries.
results.name: Bootcamp fitness and group training for women

results.description:
This meetup is for all of us who are new to the fitness world or have not exercised in awhile. It is a BEGINNERS FITNESS group, whether you were an athlete at one time or never exercised in your whole life , we can make this work for you :-) 

I want to make fitness FUN !! My plan is to start out walking , Central Park, Hudson River Park, as we continue maybe Brooklyn Bridge.. who knows. We will meet Sat. or Sundays at 11-1130 am  and one day during the week , probably Tues. or Wed. after work 7pm. (details can be found as they are posted on the calendar).

We will talk about everyone's goals and work from there. I'm a nurse and personal trainer who has a passion for fitness but got out of my routine several years ago after surgery, so I'm also starting new again too.

Ready to get back on track ..Let's do this together :-)
results.name: SHERRY'S GYM CLASS HEROS

results.description: This group is for lesbian/bisexual and straight female crossfitters who want to meet other ladies who also love fitness.  You don't need to crossfit, but you should have a passion for fitness and maintaining a healthy lifestyle.  The goal is to meet new people, have fun, and to occasionally throw down at a host gym.
results.name: Fit Chicks and Crossfit

results.description: Support for Women going through PCOS...its hard enough on your own - lets work together & support each other through this difficult syndrome we have no control over. Let's take back the control!
results.name: PCOS Support - Westchester, NY

results.description: This is a group for anyone who is ready to listen their inner-self, and create a pure positive path in their lives. Together we will learn how to identify our goals and our fears that limit our full potential. We will learn to rewrite our internal story to match our own inner guidance.
results.name: Manifesting The Goals in Your Life

results.description:
New York Travel Society! Our mission is to inspire people to explore the world and be one of the first to choose to be a Globetrotter. 

Welcome to the New York Travel Society. If you’re a travel agent, travel blogger, have a travel startup, a member of a tourist board, photographer, etc. or aspiring to work in the travel industry. Then you’re in the right place. This is the place where we join in all types of adventures; anyone, who enjoys the adventures of travel, can congregate, connect, share, and collaborate.

Join the New York Travel Society today and explore the adventures of the world!

results.description: Families with young children (birth - age 5) and their parents/caregivers are invited to this unique experience of learning, playing and socializing together.
results.name: Let's Play! A Place for Families

results.description:
¡Únense a nosotros en Farmingdale, Long Island NY! 

¡Qué dicha es rodearse de gente que te ayude a crecer como hispanoparlante y como persona! <br>

Somos un grupo de amigos y nos reunimos cada viernes,  primero para pasarla bien y segundo para mejorar nuestras habilidades en la lengua española. ¡No duden en unírsenos! Siempre es un placer conocer a nuevas personas. Damos la bienvenida a todos, del principiante al hispanoparlante de nacimiento. Sólo traigan con ustedes las ganas de aprender y la mente abierta. Hay mucho camino que recorrer ¿por qué no hacerlo juntos? 

<br>

How wonderful is it to surround yourself with people that will help you grow both as a Spanish speaker and as a person! 

We are a group of friends and we meet every Friday, first to enjoy ourselves and second to improve our Spanish. Do not hesitate to join us! It's always a pleasure meeting new people. We welcome all, from the beginner to the native speaker. Only bring with you the joy of learning and an open mind. There's so much to do, why not do it together?
results.name: ¡Reunión de amig@s en Long Island!

topics.name: Online Education & Technology For Educators and HR

results.description:
This is a group for local educators who want to learn how to engage their students more effectively on mobile devices. Through these Meetups educators will learn how to transform students' mobile devices from a distraction into an asset for leaning. Utilizing the SchoolBuilder Studio platform educators will learn how to compose an app utilizing publicly available information such as RSS feeds, calendars, videos, images, podcasts, text, webpages and more. Educators may also utilize existingclassroom content (lesson plans, PowerPoints, year-long curriculum) in addition to curating original work. 


All of our Meetups will be FREE but will be limited in capacity and will be populated on a first-come-first-serve basis. During these Meetups educators will learn the necessary skills to build an app for their classroom utilizing their own content or by pulling content from our Content Library. Each attendee will leave with free access to their app and the SchoolBuilder Studio software in addition to a certificate of recognition stating that he/she is now a Gadget Guru who is certified to assist others with the platform.
results.name: Workshops: Educators Build Mobile Apps for the Classroom

results.description: For anyone who wants to work with the creative process in their work or life. It also helps decision making and exploring the possibilities and solutions with projects.
